label: 後宮
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: (alt., Gokū) the Rear Palace, where the tennō's consorts and residential staff had their quarters. The Rear Palace was administered by twelve offices staffed with female officials, whose duties were defined by the ritsuryō Law on Personnel for the Rear Palace (Kōkyū shikiin-ryō 後宮職員令). [天皇、律令]
